entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
